metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2779 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: runuser in util-linux allows local users to escape to the parent session via a crafted TIOCSTI ioctl call, which pushes characters to the terminal's input buffer.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 2.31 introduced a --pty option that can be used eslerm> upstream revereted their patch backporting 2.31's optional --pty flag has high risk potential

criterions.comment: util-linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no patch expected').
